So ... she has slept with at least two dudes before dating Nobu. And the blond guy was the last one she broke up with because she thinks he just a stupid fuckboi who only loves her body. Now she wants a proper love with a nice guy who truly loves her but still can't forget her ex's cock so she tries to keep playing this double game.
On the other hand, from what i see the blond guy doesn't really try to win her back i.e. steal her from Nobu but he also doesn't want to let his sex partner go. Basically he just wants her to let him fuck whenever he gets horny regardless of whoever she ends up with.
Overall typical NTR but i can see this happens irl. Other NTRs are way more unrealistic tbh. So man up and don't shy pleasing your gf with lots of love guys.
If you look at it from the blond's perspective, he's doing his all so his ex gf won't get fucked by another guy. Toxic tho.
